item.peyroscythe.pontifical_knight_medal: Lost Medal of the Pontifical Knight
item.peyroscythe.clair_de_lune_disc.tool: In the piano notes, the girl recalled her past…
tooltip.item.peyroscythe.pontifical_knig: Buried with the memories of a life once left behind.
tooltip.item.peyroscythe.wintermoon_hear: An heirloom of the Wintermoon family.
tooltip.item.peyroscythe.captain_greg_do: Capt. Hanson Gregory. Recognized by the National Bakers Association as the inventor of the doughnut.
entity.peyroscythe.summoned_blaze.custom: Devotee of The Gate of Truth
entity.peyroscythe.summoned_blaze.senato: Senator of the Gate of Truth
spell.peyroscythe.ryan_tempest_edge: (WIP) Tempest Edge of Ryan the Sword Saint
spell.peyroscythe.crimson_moon.guide: Raise the Crimson Moon, applying Moon Frenzy to all creatures within range: increases attack damage, attack speed, and Blood school spell power, and restores the Crimson Moon's owner's health when dealing damage.
spell.peyroscythe.sinfire_embrace.guide: Ignite yourself with fire, temporarily losing armor but gaining powerful health regeneration. Attacks ignite targets, and killing a creature extends the effect duration — but once the flames are extinguished, the effect ends immediately.
spell.peyroscythe.frost_hell.guide: Smash the ground with your weapon to unleash a frost shockwave in a frontal cone. Damage increases based on the weapon you wield.
spell.peyroscythe.glacier.guide: Summon a massive iceberg above the target’s head and let it crash down. Higher spell levels summon larger icebergs.
spell.peyroscythe.death_smoke.guide: Engulf enemies in death smoke, gradually corroding them. If the corrosion becomes severe enough, the target will perish, restoring your health and mana.
spell.peyroscythe.the_frozen_world.guide: Instantly lowers the surrounding temperature, creating snow and ice. Creatures close to the caster take damage based on their maximum health and are immediately frozen, while an icy fog is generated.
spell.peyroscythe.icy_comet_rain.guide: Call down a shower of icy comets. Stronger levels bring heavier storms. Anything unlucky enough to be pelted too often in a short time will end up frozen solid.
spell.peyroscythe.nero_holy_ray.guide: Briefly unleashes a piercing beam of holy light, dealing additional damage based on the target's missing health.
spell.peyroscythe.mundus.guide: Summon the divine relic 'The Mundus' (its projection). Within its radiance, chant the invocation "ad village" to be transported to the nearest village, or chant "ad sanctum" to be transported to the nearest supporting structure. Beware: this spell carries a certain degree of instability!
spell.peyroscythe.holy_lance.guide: Shoot a holy lance that pierces through targets.
spell.peyroscythe.holy_bell.guide: Summon the Holy Bell to suppress your foes. Entities within its range will move extremely slowly, with reduced attack power and attack speed. ——Peyro Chan hates this trick the most.
spell.peyroscythe.ryan_tempest_edge.guid: For a short duration, you can unleash multiple wind blades. Standing casts a vertical slash wind blade that deals 1.5× damage, while sneaking casts a horizontal slash wind blade that can cut through trees. Wind blades will always critically strike creatures afflicted with certain negative effects, further multiplying total damage by 1.5×.
spell.peyroscythe.chaos_cradle.guide: Center yourself to create a wide field of Abyssal Swamp and Death Smoke. Enemies within suffer Death Smoke damage over time based on their maximum health (killing an enemy restores health and mana). While you stand in the swamp, you gain Abyssal Grace: prevents your next death. When Abyssal Grace triggers, the mud disperses. Only one of your mud fields can exist per dimension. The mud also dissipates 30s after you log out.
spell.peyroscythe.summon_blaze.guide: Summon the fanatical followers of the Gate of Truth (well, actually Blazes) to fight by your side. There is about 20% chance to summon a Senator with greater health.
death.attack.peyroscythe.frost_hell: %1$s was blended into a frozen smoothie by %2$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.frost_hell.item: %1$s was blended into a frozen smoothie by %2$s using %3$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.glacier.item: %1$s experienced rapid glacial movement—head-first—thanks to %2$s and their %3$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.death_smoke.ite: %1$s became a piece of snack by %2$s using Death Smoke brought by %3$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.the_frozen_worl: %2$s accidentally turned %1$s into a popsicle... with the freezer set way too low.
%2$s used %3$s to turn %1$s into a popsicle, but set the temperature far too low.
death.attack.peyroscythe.ice_comet_rain: %2$s dropped enough ice on %1$s to make the perfect summer milkshake.
%2$s used %3$s to turn %1$s into a summer milkshake special.
death.attack.peyroscythe.nero_holy_ray: %2$s's holy light pierced through the wicked %1$s.
death.attack.peyroscythe.nero_holy_ray.i: %2$s wielded %3$s and smote the wicked %1$s with holy light.
death.attack.peyroscythe.holy_lance: %1$s was skewered into a mango popsicle by %2$s's holy lance.
death.attack.peyroscythe.holy_lance.item: %1$s was skewered into a mango popsicle by %2$s's holy lance fired with %3$s.
message.peyroscythe.mundus.failed.empty: The Mundus did not answer. Such a structure seems not to exist in this dimension.
message.peyroscythe.mundus.failed.not_fo: The Mundus did not answer. No such structure could be found within the search range.
message.peyroscythe.mundus.success: The Mundus has spoken... and carried you away.
message.peyroscythe.abyssal_grace_revive: You suffered a fatal wound, but the Abyssal Mud revived you.
